People with congenital leptin deficiency also have hypogonadotropic hypogonadism, which is a condition caused by reduced production of hormones that direct sexual development. Without treatment, affected individuals experience delayed puberty or do not go through puberty, and may be unable to conceive children (infertile).",GHR,congenital leptin deficiency
How many people are affected by congenital leptin deficiency ?,Congenital leptin deficiency is a rare disorder.
